import Form from './styles/Form'; import DisplayError from './ErrorMessage'; export default function SignIn() { const { inputs, handleChange, clearForm, resetForm } = useForm({ name: 'nice book', price: 3245, ageRange: '5-6', author: 'Jane', inStock: 'In Stock', description: 'Testing', image: '', image2: '', image3: '', image4: '', }); const [createProduct, { data, error, loading }] = useMutation( CREATE_PRODUCT_MUTATION, { variables: inputs, refetchQueries: [{ query: ALL_PRODUCTS_QUERY }], } ); return (
